text: Jane Beryl Wilde Hawking Jones (born 29 March 1944) is an English author and teacher. She was married for 30 years to Stephen Hawking. She was born in St Albans, Hertfordshire, England. In 1999 she wrote an autobiography about her first marriage, Music to Move the Stars: A Life with Stephen. Hawking was played by Felicity Jones in the 2014 movie The Theory of Everything. ==Written works== * At Home In France: Guide to Buying and Renovating Property In France Allegro Publications 1994 * Music to Move the Stars: A Life with Stephen Macmillan Publishers, London 1999 * Travelling to Infinity: My Life with Stephen Alma Books 2007 ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:British teachers Category:Writers from Hertfordshire Category:British autobiographers Category:People from St Albans
title: Jane Hawking
